sourcesContent:
import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-coupon', templateUrl: './coupon.component.html', styleUrls: ['./coupon.component.css'] }) export class CouponComponent { @Input() coupons:any; scrollToTop(): void { window.scrollTo(0, 0); } windowScrolled = false; ngOnInit() { window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { this.windowScrolled = window.pageYOffset !== 0; }); } }
  • reorder
  • favorite
  • shopping_cart
Login | Sign Up

Coupons

Valid until: {{coupon.validUntil}}
